article: Bill and Mari are happy couple .Bill is musical , athletic and fun -loving .Mari is creative ,playful and caring .Bill's  _  include skiing ,hiking and gardening while Mari  _  time cooking , gardening and hiking .They  _  love music and play many instruments together .
